backend/main.mo: Backend actor defining user profiles, authorization checks, and comprehensive client management types including progress, follow-ups, pauses, and subscriptions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping frontend files to features, components, and test IDs with high-confidence annotations.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Plain text map of frontend file paths to short descriptions of their roles and behaviors.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light and dark theme color tokens and global layout variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file loading the React app root and SheetJS for Excel export.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main app component handling authentication, initial data loading, error states, routing, and layout with lazy-loaded pages.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginGate.t: Login screen using Internet Identity with a branded UI and secure authentication messaging.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog prompting new users to save their profile name with validation and mutation handling.
frontend/src/components/clients/Activate: Dialog for activating a client plan, allowing selection of start date and follow-up day with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientsS: Filter dropdown button for selecting client status categories, showing counts and updating the current filter.
frontend/src/components/clients/ClientSt: Displays a status badge for a client based on their display status, with variants for active, paused, expired, onboarding, and others.
frontend/src/components/clients/ExportCl: Dialog for exporting clients to Excel, supporting all-fields or select-fields modes with validation and filename generation.
frontend/src/components/clients/FollowUp: Dialog prompting follow-up completion with optional or required notes depending on mode, submitting status and notes.
Displays a client's follow‑up status, history table, and an optional button to mark follow‑up as done.
frontend/src/components/clients/PauseCli: Dialog for pausing a client plan, collecting pause duration and reason with validation before confirming.
frontend/src/components/clients/RenewSub: Dialog for renewing a subscription, handling month selection, extra days, start date validation, and confirmation.
frontend/src/components/clients/Subscrip: Displays a table of subscriptions sorted by start date, highlighting current and past plans.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Active: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show currently active clients with plan end dates.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Client: Generic dialog listing clients with export support, navigation, and configurable columns.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Expiri: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show clients whose plans expire within 10 days.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Onboar: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show clients pending onboarding with onboarding status.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Paused: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to show clients who have paused their training.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/Renewa: Dialog listing clients with plans expiring this month and offering export and navigation.
frontend/src/components/dashboard/TotalC: Wraps ClientsMetricDialog to display all active clients without plan end dates.
frontend/src/components/debug/InitialLoa: Debug panel showing initial load performance events and total duration, updated in real time.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Layout component providing header, navigation, and user menu with logout and route handling.
frontend/src/components/layout/RouteLoad: Simple loading screen with spinner for route transitions.
frontend/src/components/progress/Progres: Renders weight and body measurement line charts from client progress data using Recharts.
Form for entering client progress measurements and submitting them via mutation.
Table listing historical progress entries with trends and formatted values.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook that creates and manages the backend actor based on Internet Identity, invalidating queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorReady.ts: Hook providing a delayed 'actorReady' signal to avoid race conditions during actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication, login, logout, and persisted identity handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for fetching and mutating backend data, including app initialization, user profile, and client summaries. Seeds caches and manages query keys scoped by identity.
frontend/src/hooks/useRouter.ts: Hash-based router hook that tracks the current route, updates on hash changes, and extracts a client code from the route.
frontend/src/hooks/useStableActorConnect: Stabilizes actor connection state with a brief delay to prevent UI flicker when the backend actor becomes ready.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining light/dark theme CSS variables and base styles for the app.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up the QueryClientProvider, and wraps the app in the InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/pages/ClientProfilePage.tsx: Client detail page showing profile, status actions, progress history, and subscription management with several dialogs and lazy‑loaded components.
frontend/src/pages/ClientsListPage.tsx: Client list page supporting filtering, searching, status categorization, and preparing clients for export.
frontend/src/pages/DashboardPage.tsx: Dashboard overview computing metrics for active, paused, expiring, and onboarding clients, with dialogs for detailed lists.
frontend/src/pages/OnboardClientPage.tsx: Form page for creating a new client with onboarding state, validation, submission, and success screen.
frontend/src/utils/clientCode.ts: Utility functions for formatting, normalizing, and matching client codes.
frontend/src/utils/clientExportFields.ts: Defines exportable client fields with accessors for Excel or CSV generation.
frontend/src/utils/errors.ts: Converts backend errors into simplified, user-friendly messages.
frontend/src/utils/excelExport.ts: Exports client data to an Excel file using SheetJS, building headers and rows dynamically.
frontend/src/utils/followUp.ts: Helpers for determining follow‑up due status and retrieving latest follow‑up entries.
frontend/src/utils/format.ts: Timestamp formatting helpers for date, datetime, and Excel date output.
frontend/src/utils/initialLoadTimings.ts: Lightweight utility for tracking and reporting initial load performance timings.
frontend/src/utils/plan.ts: Functions to compute plan durations, end dates, and format dates for input controls.
Identifies clients with subscription renewals due this month and counts them.
frontend/src/utils/status.ts: Determines client activation, status, display status, and computes status metrics.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them to sessionStorage, and removing them from hash-based routes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with custom colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state and requirements for stabilizing onboarding and handling backend actor readiness errors.
